item.title: Load Balancer
item.description: Load balancer in Layer 4 and Layer 7 This is the first of series of knowledge sequences about technologies and stuffs. I hope you enjoy the journey. WHAT IS LOAD BALANCER? Before starting talking about what Load Balancer is, let’s talk about layers. Layer is the OSI Model method to destribute and organize the application path to come up into your website. This picture below shows you how is that works properly.
